If you do, this creature can attack players this turn and is put on the bottom of your deck at the end of the turn. ■ When you put this creature, choose one of the following. ▼ Your opponent shuffles their graveyard and puts it on the bottom of their deck. ▼ Put the top 2 cards of your deck into your graveyard.

Put all creatures that have "blocker" from the revealed cards into your hand and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

You win if your card costs the same as or more than your opponent.)

card.name: Dragon World ~The Land Where Dragons Descend~

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ At the start of your turn, put the top card of your deck into your graveyard. If that card is a non-evolution Dragon, you may destroy this field. If you do, put that Dragon.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone tapped. If it's a Dragon, put another card from the top of your deck into your mana zone tapped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {EX LIFE} (As you put this creature, shieldify the top card of your deck. When this creature would leave, put that shield into your graveyard instead.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {QUATTRO BREAKER} ■ When you summon this creature, reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Put any number of creatures from among them and the rest into your mana zone. ■ At the start of your turn, if you have 4 or more creatures that cost 8 or more, you win the game.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature , choose a creature card name except 'Emotional Hardcore, Sacred Dragon'. ■ Ignore any abilities of creatures that have the chosen name. ■ Whenever your opponent would choose a creature, if you have another Oracle, they can't choose this one. (It can still be attacked or blocked.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ When you put this creature, you may draw a card for each of your light creatures and/or light tamaseeds. ■ Your light creatures and light tamaseeds cost 2 less to use. They can't cost 0 or less. ■ 'Civil Count 5': If you have a total of 5 or more light creatures and/or light tamaseeds, this creature gets +10000 power, "triple breaker" and "Whenever this creature attacks, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures. Your opponent shieldifies it.".

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this tamaseed, put the top card of your deck into your graveyard. Then choose one of your opponent's creatures or tamaseeds that costs the same as or less than the number of cards in your graveyard and destroy it. ■ If you don't have a total of 4 or more darkness creatures and/or darkness tamaseeds, this tamaseed isn't treated as a creature in the battle zone. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may put a non-evolution creature that costs 6 or less from your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) ■ Whenever this creature attacks, discard a card from your hand then draw a card. ■ Once per turn, when you would discard one or more creatures that cost 3 or less from your hand, you may put them instead. They get "speed attacker" until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {MACH FIGHTER} (This creature can attack tapped or untapped creatures on the turn you put it.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature wins a battle, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. You may put a creature from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your mana zone. TWINPACT ■ Shuffle your deck, then reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a creature, put it. Otherwise, put it into your mana zone.

Rules2
property.value: ■ Shuffle your deck, then reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a creature, put it. Otherwise, put it into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GUARD STRIKE} (When you add this creature from your shield zone to your hand, you may reveal it to your opponent and choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature can't attack this turn.) ■ When you put this creature, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone tapped. Then you may return a card from your mana zone to your hand. ■ Once per turn, when you summon another creature, you may put a creature that has the same name from your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {VIVIDDRAW} {WF8} (During your turn, when you draw this creature before you attack, you may reveal it. If you do, you may pay Water/Fire 8 to summon this creature this turn.) {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature with its "Vividdraw" ability, draw 3 cards. ■ When you put this creature, you may choose a water or fire card from your hand that costs less than or the same as the number of cards in your hand. If you do, use that card for no cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. From among them, put up to 2 creatures that cost 3 or less. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ If your opponent has a creature in the battle zone that costs more than the number of cards in your opponent's mana zone, this spell in your shield zone gets "shield trigger". ■ Choose 2 of the following. (You may choose the same one twice.): ► Put all your opponent's creatures that have the lowest power into their owner's mana zone. ► Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Shieldify one of them and put the one into your mana zone: ► Put an element that costs 5 or less from your hand. It gets "blocker" until the start of your next turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Each turn, whenever you put a Hyper Beast for the first time, choose one of your opponent's creatures and tap it. At the start of your opponent's next turn, that creature doesn't untap. {HYPERIFY} Tap one of your other creatures. (During your main step, you may unleash Hyper Mode. Hyper Mode stays until the start of your next turn.) ---- {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature attacks a player, look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Put any number of Hyper Beasts from among them that have total cost 8 or less. Put the rest into your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ You may summon Abyss creatures from your graveyard. (Pay the cost.) {HYPERIFY}: Tap 2 of your other creatures. (During your main step, you may unleash Hyper Mode. Hyper Mode stays until the start of your next turn.) ---- {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature attacks, put the top 3 cards of your deck into your graveyard. Then choose up to 2 of your opponent's creatures that have total cost the same as or less than the number of cards in your graveyard and destroy them.

property.name: Rules
